name: Finger Splash- Reaction Time
description:
Watch out the Flying Blades! See how long you can hold on!

Finger cutter type finger slice game for you finger cut and swipe game players.
Test your reaction time by trying to evade the flying blade.
Finger Cutter is a fun and pass around yet an addictive game. So Time your Finger properly and save it from getting hurt by the blades.

features:
-Three Challenge game modes.
-Amazing blades effects.
-Simple controls make the game more interesting!
-Share your score through Google leadbords!
